thread.title: Bengals' Adam 'Pacman' Jones to officers during arrest: 'I hope you die tomorrow'
thread.title_full: Bengals' Adam 'Pacman' Jones to officers during arrest: 'I hope you die tomorrow'

title: Bengals' Adam 'Pacman' Jones to officers during arrest: 'I hope you die tomorrow'
text: This video is no longer available Pacman Jones Arrest Video ... Told Cop 'Suck My D***, I Hope You Die' TMZ Sports has obtained the Pacman Jones arrest video from his hotel incident on Jan. 3rd -- in which he GOES OFF on the arresting cops ... telling the to "suck my d***" and "I hope you die tomorrow."
